Articles.Content:
A place for those who have sent somethign out of Kerbol's influence, may it be space station or a simple, barely even running vessel by the time it had finally done so.

I would like to encourage mods be used, but no debug cheating (except for part clipping in editors)
I have with some probes it is so far that you can barely see the sun

Unfortunately, Kerbol's SOI is infinite.

However if you move fast enough away you do not get an return path. think its if your Ap is over 68 years away. Have no idea that happens if you try to lift Ap a bit higher so you don't get an return path and then warp.

The kraken eats you, unfortunately. I've heard that's probably due to computing errors from rounding the last digit getting insanely large for these distances. It effectively equals hitting a wall on the edge on the universe.
